description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Conquer 8 levels across 4 worlds of retro 2D space-shooting action! Fight epic boss battles, and team up with your friends for up to 4-player co-op action!
description.short: Conquer 8 levels across 4 worlds of retro 2D space-shooting action! Fight epic boss battles, and team up with your friends for up to 4-player co-op action!
